column1: Traffic reports will resume Wednesday September 25 at 4:00 p.m.

column3: TRAFFIC ALERT FOR I-75S IN FAYETTE CO:
column4: The roadway is shut down at Exit 115 (Newtown Pike) due to a collision involving a semi just south of Exit 113 (Paris Pike).

column3: TRAFFIC ALERT FOR I-75S IN FAYETTE CO:
column4: The semi is reportedly leaking a significant amount of fluids.

column3: TRAFFIC ALERT FOR I-75S IN FAYETTE CO:
column4: No access to I-75S from Newtown Pike or N Broadway.
